title: Angela Rayner: MPs hit back over claims of 'Basic Instinct' tactics to distract PM - BBC News
description: An article suggesting Labour's deputy tries to distract the PM in the Commons is roundly condemned.

title: Partygate: Removing PM would lead to instability, says Oliver Dowden - BBC News
description: As some Tories join calls for Boris Johnson to quit over partygate, his chairman says it would bring uncertainty.
